subtitle: chapter 12 the development of the wheel
say to yourself a hundred times every

the will to initiate the will to direct

any purpose the will to carry through

this last-mentioned function has been
ignored but it is by far the most

the great importance of having a

any force that may be applied either in

powerful will however is never

domineering will is weak
it may be seemingly strong on the spur

a strong will however is deep continuous

entire individuality and as you exercise

me though persistently aroused when we

one of its functions among what could be

else
